page.title: 02OCCUPATIONS IN MISSON
page.content: In Misson there are lots of people with occupations.My Mum is a teacher and my Dad is a Probation Officer.Some people from Misson School went around the village interviewing people to find out the occupations.Some of the information came from what we know about ourselves.We have quite a lot of farmers and retired people.Next door to me there is one person who is retired and my other neighbour,a lady,works in a shop during the day and in a pub at night.Along the street there is another family the lady is an insurance broker's clerk and the man is a farmer who works mostly on a ford tractor.
